price: 49. Markuu ka fogaaday iyaga iyo waxay caabudi Alle sokadi, waxaan u hibeynay Isxaaq iyo Yacquub, mid walbaana Waxaan ka yeelnay Nabi.
arabic: فَلَمَّا ٱعۡتَزَلَهُمۡ وَمَا يَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَۖ وَكُلّٗا جَعَلۡنَا نَبِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falammā iʿ'tazalahum wamā yaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi wahabnā lahu is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba wakullan jaʿalnā nabiyyan
